DOC.brief_summary: Infant young child feeding ( IYCF ) key determinant under-nutrition overweight young child . In Mexico , breastfeed extends well second half infancy , animal-source food , cereal , legumes regularly provide child 9 mo . This study evaluate whether knowledge practice dietary diversity food consistency improve use two-component intervention strategy semi-urban community Mexico . The two component deliver appropriate complementary feeding message use : ( ) nurse 1st National Vaccination Week ( NVW ) ; ( b ) radio message interview . The intervention evaluate use cluster randomize design small semi-urban community two state Mexico pre- post-test questionnaire design assess change feed behavior .
DOC.brief_title: Partnering With Media Vaccination Program Improve Infant Young Child Feeding
